ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest interview...
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, not sure the name, but I d love to hear from who the frock made the decision to nerf the monk class out of general usefulness.  Brad?  I have a message
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, not sure the name, but I'd love to hear from who
the frock made the decision to nerf the monk class out
of general usefulness. Brad? I have a message for
him not suitable for minors who might read this board,
but you can picture what it might be after all of the
time I have invested in my monk. </em grins evilly>

Quwi Changkane Grandmaster of Fenin Ro

--- goldleader <swany0916@...> wrote:
> I'm planning an interview with a developer or
> producer for
> Everquest. Who do you guys think would make an
> interesting interview?
>
> Any questions you'd like answered?
>
> Thanks,
>
> David
> VideoGameRadio.com
>
